item.title: Fly tipping outside Long Walk bin store - Nightingale Place end, 3rd December
item.description:
A metal bed frame, and some other rubbish have been dumped outside of the bin store on Long Walk - Nightingale Place end. There is also a broken down wooden bed on the grass, in the car park next to the bin store.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Long Walk, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Between 2a Oakhill Avenue and 39 Redington Road, 3rd December
item.description:
The pavement on Oakhill Avenue is being obstructed by a severely overgrown tree whose branches and foliage hang completely across the width of the public footway. The growth extends from private property over the boundary wall and forces pedestrians to step into the road to pass, which creates a significant safety riskâ€”particularly for children, older residents, wheelchair users, and anyone walking with prams or dogs. The obstruction appears to be long-standing, with dense foliage and surrounding overgrown hedging preventing safe passage. The tree and vegetation require urgent attention, either by being substantially trimmed back or, if structurally unsuitable, removed altogether to restore clear access to the pavement. This is a pedestrian safety hazard and should be inspected as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakhill Avenue, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gas Bottles dumped at Park entrance opposite Dallin Road., 3rd December
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Plum Lane, Plumstead

item.title: Rubbish dumped, 3rd December
item.description:
Whole load of rubbish dumped for several metres of the pavement. Makes access very difficult for wheel and pushchair users as well as those with limited mobility or using walking aids. This area is regularly used by fly tippers, declutterers and the like. It needs a camera and signage imo.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Manorway, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet
